Name: StackFortress
About the game: Summary A unique tower defense game. Where you design and build your defense block by block. Features Build tower block by block, free form building let you design and create unique structure. Combine functional component to create unique structure, mining, shield, weapon, power generator provide different function. Power Grid to provide power to your components, stable power supply can mean the different between life and death. Different type of hostile alien threats, require player to plan differently. Overcharge your weapons by connecting with power injector, which use more power and overheat. [Planned]Cooling system, building radiator to provide adequate cooling, and let weapon operate overcapacity.
